app.application_description: مونیکا ابزاری برای مدیریت تعاملات شما با عزیزان، دوستان و خانواده خود است.
app.application_og_title: با عزیزان خود روابط بهتری داشته باشید. CRM آنلاین رایگان برای دوستان و خانواده.
app.compliance_desc: We have changed our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. By law we have to ask you to review them and accept them so you can continue to use your account.
app.compliance_desc_end: We don’t do anything nasty with your data or your account and we never will.
app.compliance_terms: Accept new terms and privacy policy
app.error_maintenance: Maintenance in progress. We’ll be right back.
app.error_no_term: There is no policy for this instance yet.
app.error_save: We had an error trying to save the data.
app.error_try_again: Something went wrong. Please try again.
app.error_twitter: Follow our Twitter account to be alerted when it’s up again.
app.error_unauthorized: You don’t have the right to edit this resource.
app.error_user_account: This user does not belong to the given account.
app.file_selected: یک فایل انتخاب شده …|{count} فایل انتخاب شده …

app.footer_new_version: یک نسخه جدید از مونیکا در دسترس می‌باشد.
app.markdown_description: آیا می خواهید متن خود را به خوبی قالب بندی کنید؟ ما از Markdown برای Bold، italic، لیست‌ها و موارد دیگر پشتیبانی می‌کنیم.
app.weather_moderate-or-heavy-rain-with-thun: Moderate or heavy rain with thunder
app.weather_moderate-or-heavy-showers-of-ice: Moderate or heavy showers of ice pellets
app.weather_moderate-or-heavy-snow-with-thun: Moderate or heavy snow with thunder

auth.2fa_one_time_or_recuperation: کد احراز هویت دو عاملی یا کد بازیابی را وارد کنید
auth.2fa_otp_help: برنامه تلفن همراه احراز هویت دو عاملی خود را باز کنید و کد را کپی کنید
auth.2fa_recuperation_code: کد بازیابی دوگانه را وارد کنید
auth.confirmation_again: اگر میخواهید ایمیل خود را تغییر دهید می‌توانید اینجا کلیک کنید.
auth.confirmation_check: قبل از ادامه، لطفاً ایمیل خود را برای لینک تأیید بررسی کنید.
auth.confirmation_fresh: یک لینک تأیید جدید به آدرس ایمیلتان ارسال  شد.
auth.confirmation_request_another: اگر ایمیل را دریافت نکرده اید برای درخواست مجدد اینجا کلیک کنید.
auth.confirmation_title: آدرس ایمیل خود را تایید کنید
auth.create_account: برای ایجاد یک حساب کاربری جدید اینجا کلیک کنید
auth.email_change_title: آدرس ایمیل خود را تغییر دهید
auth.email_changed: ادرس ایمیل شما تغییر کرد . صندوق پستی خود را برای تایید ایمیل چک کنید.
auth.failed: مشخصات وارد شده با اطلاعات ما سازگار نیست.
auth.login_again: لطفاً مجدداً وارد حساب کاربری خود شوید
auth.mfa_auth_otp: با دستگاه دو عاملی خود احراز هویت کنید
auth.not_authorized: شما مجاز به انجام این عمل نیستید.
auth.password_reset_email_content: برای تغییر رمز عبور اینجا کلیک کنید:
auth.register_create_account: شما برای استفاده از مونیکا لازم است یک حساب کاربری ایجاد کنید
auth.register_email: لطفا یک آدرس ایمیل معتبر را وارد کنید
auth.register_invitation_email: برای اهداف امنیتی، لطفاً ایمیل شخصی را که شما را برای پیوستن به این حساب دعوت کرده است، مشخص کنید. این اطلاعات در ایمیل دعوت وجود دارد.
auth.register_login: اگر حساب کاربری دارید وارد شوید ​
auth.register_password_example: یک رمز عبور مطمئن وارد کنید
auth.register_policy: ثبت نام شما به معنی مطالعه و قبول سیاست حفظ حریم خصوصی و قوانین و مقررات می باشد.
auth.register_title_create: حساب کاربری مونیکا خود را بسازید
auth.register_title_welcome: به نمونه تازه نصب شده مونیکا خود خوش آمدید
auth.signup_disabled: ثبت نام در حال حاضر غیر فعال است
auth.signup_error: هنگام ثبت نام کاربر خطایی روی داد
auth.throttle: تعداد دفعات تلاش برای ورود به سیستم بسیار زیاد است. لطفا در :seconds ثانیه دیگر تلاش نمایید.
auth.use_recovery: یا شما می‌توانید از کد بازیابی استفاده کنید

journal.journal_rate: How was your day? You can rate it once a day.

settings.2fa_enable_otp_validate: لطفاً دستگاه جدیدی را که به تازگی راه‌اندازی کرده‌اید تأیید کنید:
settings.api_authorized_clients_desc: This section lists all the clients you’ve authorized to access your application data. You can revoke this authorization at anytime.
settings.api_authorized_clients_none: There are no authorized clients yet.
settings.api_description: The API can be used to manipulate Monica’s data from an external application, like a mobile application for instance.
settings.api_endpoint: The API endpoint for this Monica instance is:
settings.api_help: To use the API, a token is mandatory. You can either create a personal access token (Bearer authentication), or authorize an OAuth client to create it for you. See API documentation.
settings.api_oauth_clients_desc: This section lets you register your own OAuth clients.
settings.api_oauth_clients_desc2: Use this client id to request a new token, and convert authorization codes to access tokens. See Laravel Passport documentation for more information.
settings.api_oauth_name_help: Something your users will recognize and trust.
settings.api_oauth_not_created: You have not created any OAuth clients.
settings.api_pao_description: Make sure you give this token to a source you trust – as they allow you to access all your data.
settings.api_token_help: Here is your new personal access token. This is the only time it will be shown so don’t lose it! You may now use this token to make API requests.
settings.api_token_not_created: You have not created any personal access tokens.
settings.archive_desc: This will archive all of the contacts in your account.
settings.archive_title: Archive all of the contacts in your account
settings.dav_caldav_birthdays_export: Export all birthdays in one file
settings.dav_caldav_tasks_export: Export all tasks in one file
settings.dav_carddav_export: Export all contacts in one file
settings.dav_connect_help: You can connect your contacts and/or calendars with this base url on you phone or computer.
settings.dav_connect_help2: Use your login (email) and create an API token as the password to authenticate.
settings.dav_description: Here you can find all settings to use WebDAV resources for CardDAV and CalDAV exports.
settings.dav_url_base: Base url for all CardDAV and CalDAV resources:
settings.delete_desc: Do you wish to delete your account? Deletion is permanent and all of your data will be erased permanently. If you have a subscription, it will be cancelled immediately.
settings.delete_notice: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This is permanent and cannot be undone. All of your data will be deleted and will not be recoverable.
settings.delete_other_desc: Your data in the main database will be deleted immediately. As described in our privacy policy, we carry out securely encrypted backups of the database every day.  These backups are kept for 30 days after which they are completely deleted. We cannot delete specific data from the backups we hold any earlier than this.  All of your data will be completely deleted no later than 31 days after your account’s deletion.
settings.email_help: از این ایمیل برای ورود و همچنین ارسال یاد آوری ها استفاده می شود.
settings.export_be_patient: Click the button to start the export. It might take several minutes to process the export – please be patient and do not spam the button.
settings.export_json_beta: Json export is in preview mode. Tell us what you think about it:
settings.export_json_explanation: Exporting your data in Json format for backup.
settings.export_not_done: Download impossible, this export is not done yet.
settings.export_sql_explanation: Exporting your data in SQL format allows you to take your data and import it to your own Monica instance. This is only valuable if you do have your own server.
settings.export_sql_link_instructions: Note: read the instructions to learn more about importing this file to your instance.
settings.export_submitted: Your export has been submitted, it will be available in a few moment…
settings.export_title: داده های حساب خود را برون ریزی  کنید
settings.import_blank_description: We can import vCard files that you can get from Google Contacts or your Contact manager.
settings.import_blank_question: Would you like to import contacts now?
settings.import_blank_title: You haven’t imported any contacts yet.
settings.import_in_progress: The import is in progress. Reload the page in one minute.
settings.import_report_number_contacts: Number of contacts in the file
settings.import_result_stat: Uploaded vCard with 1 contact (:total_imported imported, :total_skipped skipped)|Uploaded vCard with :total_contacts contacts (:total_imported imported, :total_skipped skipped)
settings.import_upload_behaviour_add: Add new contacts and skip existing
settings.import_upload_behaviour_help: Replacing will replace all data found in the vCard, but will keep existing contact fields.
settings.import_upload_rule_cant_revert: Please make sure data is accurate before uploading, as you can’t undo the upload.
settings.import_upload_rule_instructions: Export instructions for macOS Contacts.app and Google Contacts.
settings.import_upload_rule_multiple: If your contacts have multiple email addresses or phone numbers, only the first entry will be saved.
settings.import_upload_rule_time: It might take up to a minute to upload the contacts and process them. Please be patient.
settings.import_upload_rule_vcard: We support the vCard 3.0 format, which is the default format for macOS’s Contacts.app and Google Contacts.
settings.import_upload_rules_desc: We do however have some rules:
settings.import_upload_title: Import your contacts from a vCard file
settings.import_vcard_parse_error: Error when parsing the vCard entry

settings.personalisation_paid_upgrade: This is a premium feature that requires a Paid subscription to be active. Upgrade your account by visiting Settings > Subscription.
settings.personalisation_paid_upgrade_vue: This is a premium feature that requires a Paid subscription to be active. Upgrade your account by visiting Settings > Subscription.
settings.personalization_activity_type_category_a: Add a new activity type category
settings.personalization_activity_type_category_d: An activity with one of your contacts can have a type and a category type. Your account comes with a set of predefined category types by default, but you can customize these here.
settings.personalization_activity_type_category_m: Add a new activity type category
Are you sure you want to delete this category? Deleting it will delete all associated activity types. Activities that belong to this category will not be affected by this deletion.
We can’t find this activity type category.
What should we name this new category?
settings.personalization_activity_type_modal_dele: Are you sure you want to delete this activity type? Activities that belong to this category will not be affected by this deletion.
We can’t find this activity type.
settings.personalization_activity_type_modal_ques: What should we name this new activity type?
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_add_s: The contact field type has been successfully added.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_delet: The contact field type has been successfully deleted.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_descr: You can configure all the different types of contact fields that you can associate to all your contacts. For example, if a new social network appears in the future, you will be able to add this new way of communicating with your contacts right here.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_edit_: The contact field type has been successfully updated.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_modal: Are you sure you want to delete this contact field type? Deleting this type of contact field will delete ALL the data with this type for all of your contacts.
Delete an existing contact field type
Edit an existing contact field type
You can associate an icon with this contact field type. You need to add a reference to a Font Awesome icon.
Each new contact field type can be clickable. If a protocol is set, we will use it to trigger the action that is set.
Add a new contact field type
settings.personalization_genders_desc: You can define as many genders as you need to. You need at least one gender type in your account.
settings.personalization_genders_modal_default: Select the default gender for a new contact
settings.personalization_genders_modal_delete_des: Are you sure you want to delete the gender “{name}”?
settings.personalization_genders_modal_delete_que: You currently have {count} contact with this gender. If you delete this gender, what gender should this contact have?|You currently have {count} contacts with this gender. If you delete this gender, what gender should these contacts have?
This gender is the default one. If you delete this gender, which one will be the new default?
settings.personalization_genders_modal_error: Please choose a gender from the list.
settings.personalization_genders_modal_name_help: The name used to display the gender on a contact page.
settings.personalization_genders_modal_sex_help: Used to define the relationships, and during the VCard import/export process.
settings.personalization_life_event_category_desc: A life event can have a type and a category. Your account comes with a set of predefined categories and types by default, but you can customize life event types here.
settings.personalization_life_event_type_add_butt: Add a new life event type
settings.personalization_life_event_type_modal_ad: Add a new life event type
settings.personalization_life_event_type_modal_de: Are you sure you want to delete this life event type? Life events that belong to this type will be deleted by performing this action.
We can’t find this life event type.
settings.personalization_life_event_type_modal_qu: What should we name this new life event type?
settings.personalization_module_desc: You may not need all of Monica’s features. Below you can toggle specific features that are used on a contact sheet. This change will affect ALL your contacts. Turning off a feature does not delete any data, it simply hides the feature.
settings.personalization_reminder_rule_desc: For every reminder that you set, Monica can send you an email a number of days before the event happens.  You can adjust these notification settings here. These notifications only apply to monthly and yearly reminders.
settings.personalization_title: Here you will find different settings to configure your account. These features are intended for “power users” who want maximum control over Monica.
settings.recovery_already_used_help: This code has already been used.
settings.recovery_generate_help: Generating new codes will invalidate previously generated codes.
settings.recovery_help_information: You can use each recovery code once.
settings.reminder_time_to_send: Time of the day reminders will be sent
settings.reminder_time_to_send_help: Your next reminder is scheduled to be sent on {dateTime}.
settings.reset_desc: Do you wish to reset your account? This will remove all your contacts, and all of the data associated with them. Your account will not be deleted.
settings.reset_notice: Are you sure to reset your account? This is permanent and cannot be undone.
settings.reset_success: Your account has been reset successfully.
settings.security_help: Change security matters for your account.
settings.storage_account_info: Your account limit is :accountLimit MB. Your current usage is :currentAccountSize MB (about :percentUsage%).
settings.storage_description: Here you can see all the documents and photos uploaded about your contacts.
settings.storage_upgrade_notice: Upgrade your account to be able to upload documents and photos.
settings.stripe_error_api_connection: Network communication with Stripe failed. Try again later.
settings.stripe_error_card: Your card was declined. Decline message is: :message
settings.stripe_error_rate_limit: Too many requests with Stripe right now. Try again later.
settings.subscriptions_account_cancel: You can cancel your subscription at any time.
settings.subscriptions_account_confirm_payment: Your payment is currently incomplete, please confirm your payment.
settings.subscriptions_account_current_paid_plan: You are on the :name plan. Thanks so much for being a subscriber.
settings.subscriptions_account_free_plan: You are on the free plan.
settings.subscriptions_account_free_plan_benefits: Support the project in the long run, so we can introduce more great features.
settings.subscriptions_account_free_plan_upgrade: You can upgrade your account to the :name plan, which costs $:price per month. Here are the advantages:
settings.subscriptions_account_payment: Which payment option fits you best?
settings.subscriptions_account_update_description: You can change your subscription’s frequency here.
settings.subscriptions_account_update_information: You will be billed immediately for the new amount. Your subscription will extend to the new period, depending on your choice.
settings.subscriptions_account_upgrade_choice: Pick a plan below and join over :customers persons who upgraded their Monica.
settings.subscriptions_account_upgrade_title: Upgrade Monica today and have more meaningful relationships.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_limitations: The free plan has limitations. In order to be able to downgrade, you need to pass the checklist below:
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_contacts: You must not have more than :number active contacts
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_contacts_ar: We can also archive all your contacts for you – that would clear this rule and let you proceed with your account’s downgrade process.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_contacts_co: You currently have 1 contact.|You currently have :count contacts.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_invitations: You must not have any pending invitations
You currently have 1 pending invitation.|You currently have :count pending invitations.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_users: You must have only 1 user in your account
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_users_const: You currently have 1 user in your account.|You currently have :count users in your account.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_success: You are back to the Free plan!
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_thanks: Thanks so much for trying the paid plan. We keep adding new features on Monica all the time – so you might want to come back in the future to see if you might be interested in taking a subscription again.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_title: Downgrade your account to the free plan
settings.subscriptions_help_change_desc: You can cancel anytime, no questions asked, and all by yourself – no need to contact support. However, you will not be refunded for the current period.
settings.subscriptions_help_change_title: What if I change my mind?
settings.subscriptions_help_discounts_desc: We do! Monica is free for students, and free for non-profits and charities. Just contact the support with a proof of your status and we’ll apply this special status in your account.
settings.subscriptions_help_discounts_title: Do you have discounts for non-profits and education?
settings.subscriptions_help_limits_plan: Yes. Free plans let you manage :number contacts.
settings.subscriptions_help_limits_title: Is there a limit to the number of contacts we can have on the free plan?
settings.subscriptions_help_opensource_desc: Monica is an open source project.  This means it is built by a community who wants to build a great tool for the greater good. Being open source means the code is publicly available on GitHub, and everyone can inspect it, modify it or enhance it. All the money we raise is dedicated to building better features, paying for more powerful servers, and paying other costs. Thanks for your help. We couldn’t do it without you.
settings.subscriptions_help_opensource_title: What is an open source project?
settings.subscriptions_help_title: Additional details you may be curious about
settings.subscriptions_payment_confirm_informatio: Extra confirmation is needed to process your payment. Please confirm your payment by filling out your payment details below.
settings.subscriptions_payment_succeeded: This payment was already successfully confirmed.
settings.subscriptions_plan_include2: Unlimited number of contacts • Unlimited number of users • Reminders by email • Import with vCard • Personalization of the contact sheet
settings.subscriptions_plan_include3: 100% of the profits go the development of this great open source project.
settings.subscriptions_plan_year_bonus: Peace of mind for a whole year
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_charge: We’ll charge your card :price now. The next charge will be on :date. If you ever change your mind, you can cancel at any time, no questions asked.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_charge_handled: The payment is handled by Stripe. No card information touches our server.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_infos: We couldn’t be happier. Enter your payment info below.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_success: Thank you! You are now subscribed.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_thanks: Welcome to the community of people who try to make the world a better place.
settings.tags_blank_description: Tags work like folders, but you can add more than one tag to a contact. Go to a contact and tag a friend, right below the name. Once a contact is tagged, come back here to manage all the tags in your account.
settings.tags_blank_title: Tags are a great way of categorizing your contacts.
settings.tags_list_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the tag? No contacts will be deleted, only the tag.
settings.tags_list_delete_success: The tag has been successfully deleted
settings.tags_list_description: You can organize your contacts by setting up tags. Tags work like folders, but you can add more than one tag to a contact. To add a new tag, add it on the contact itself.
settings.tags_list_edit_success: The tag has been successfully updated
settings.users_accept_title: Accept invitation and create a new account
settings.users_add_confirmation: I confirm that I want to invite this user to my account. I understand that this person will have access to ALL of my data and see exactly what I see.
settings.users_add_description: This person will have the same access as you do, including inviting or deleting other users, including you. Make sure you trust this person before giving them access.
settings.users_add_email_field: Enter the email of the person you want to invite
settings.users_add_title: Invite a new user to your account by email
settings.users_blank_add_title: Would you like to invite someone else?
settings.users_blank_description: This person will have the same access that you have, and will be able to add, edit or delete contact information.
settings.users_blank_title: You are the only one who has access to this account.
settings.users_error_already_invited: You already have invited this user. Please choose another email address.
settings.users_error_email_already_taken: This email is already taken. Please choose another one
settings.users_error_email_not_similar: This is not the email of the person who’ve invited you.
settings.users_error_please_confirm: Please confirm that you want to invite this user before proceeding with the invitation
settings.users_invitation_deleted_confirmation_me: The invitation has been successfully deleted
settings.users_invitation_need_subscription: Adding more users requires a subscription.
settings.users_invitations_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this invitation?
settings.users_list_delete_confirmation: Are you sure to delete this user from your account?
settings.users_list_invitations_explanation: Below are the people you’ve invited to join Monica as a collaborator.
settings.users_list_title: Users with access to your account
settings.webauthn_buttonAdvise: If your security key has a button, press it.
settings.webauthn_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this key?
settings.webauthn_error_already_used: This key is already registered. It’s not necessary to register it again.
settings.webauthn_error_not_allowed: The operation either timed out or was not allowed.
settings.webauthn_noButtonAdvise: If it does not, remove it and insert it again.
settings.webauthn_not_secured: WebAuthn only supports secure connections. Please load this page with https scheme.
settings.webauthn_not_supported: Your browser doesn’t currently support WebAuthn.
settings.webauthn_success: Your key is detected and validated.

validation.after: ویژگی باید در تاریخی بعد از تاریخ باشد.
validation.after_or_equal: attribute باید یک تاریخ بعد باشد یا برابر باشد: date.
validation.alpha_dash: :attribute باید فقط حروف الفبا، اعداد، خط تیره و زیرخط باشد.
validation.alpha_num: :attribute باید فقط حروف الفبا و اعداد باشد.
validation.before: ویژگی باید در تاریخی قبل از تاریخ باشد.
validation.before_or_equal: attribute باید تاریخ قبل یا برابر باشد: date.

between.string: ویژگی باید بین حداقل حداکثر کاراکتر باشد.

validation.boolean: مقدار :attribute باید true یا false باشد.
validation.different: :attribute و :other باید از یکدیگر متفاوت باشند.
validation.digits_between: تعداد ارقام :attribute باید بین :min و :max رقم باشد.
validation.distinct: فیلد attribute دارای مقدار تکراری است.
validation.email: مقدار :attribute باید یک آدرس ایمیل معتبر باشد.
validation.ends_with: فیلد :attribute باید با یکی از مقادیر زیر خاتمه یابد: :values

gt.array: :attribute باید بیشتر از :value آیتم داشته باشد.
gt.string: :attribute باید بیشتر از :value کاراکتر داشته باشد.

gte.array: :attribute باید بیشتر یا مساوی :value آیتم داشته باشد.
gte.file: :attribute باید بزرگتر یا مساوی :value کیلوبایت باشد.
gte.string: :attribute باید بیشتر یا مساوی :value کاراکتر داشته باشد.

validation.ip: مقدار :attribute باید یک آدرس IP معتبر باشد.
validation.ipv4: :attribute باید یک آدرس معتبر از نوع IPv4 باشد.
validation.ipv6: :attribute باید یک آدرس معتبر از نوع IPv6 باشد.
validation.json: فیلد :attribute باید یک رشته از نوع JSON باشد.

lt.array: :attribute باید کمتر از :value آیتم داشته باشد.
lt.string: :attribute باید کمتر از :value کاراکتر داشته باشد.

lte.array: :attribute باید کمتر یا مساوی :value آیتم داشته باشد.
lte.file: :attribute باید کوچکتر یا مساوی :value کیلوبایت باشد.
lte.string: :attribute باید کمتر یا مساوی :value کاراکتر داشته باشد.

max.array: ویژگی: ممکن است بیش از موارد حداکثر داشته باشد.
max.string: :attribute نباید بیشتر از :max کاراکتر داشته باشد.

validation.mimes: :attribute باید یک فایل از نوع :values باشد.
validation.mimetypes: :attribute باید یک فایل از نوع :values باشد.
validation.required_if: فیلد :attribute اجباری است تا زمانی که :other در :values باشد.
validation.required_unless: فیلد :attribute اجباری است تا زمانی که :other در :values باشد.
validation.required_with: فیلد :attribute اجباری است تا زمانی که :values وجود داشته باشد.
validation.required_with_all: فیلد :attribute اجباری است تا زمانی که :values وجود داشته باشد.
validation.required_without: فیلد :attribute اجباری است تا زمانی که :values وجود نداشته باشد.
validation.required_without_all: در صورت عدم وجود هر یک از فیلدهای :values، فیلد :attribute الزامی است.

size.file: حجم :attribute باید به اندازه :size کیلوبایت باشد.

validation.starts_with: فیلد :attribute باید با یکی از مقادیر زیر شروع شود: :values
validation.timezone: فیلد :attribute باید یک منطقه زمانی معتبر باشد.
validation.uuid: فیلد :attribute باید یک UUID معتبر باشد.
